thread.title: 'The Flash' 2.03 Preview: 'Family of Rogues' to Welcome Captain Cold's Dad
thread.title_full: 'The Flash' 2.03 Preview: 'Family of Rogues' to Welcome Captain Cold's Dad

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'The Flash' 2.03 Preview: 'Family of Rogues' to Welcome Captain Cold's Dad
text:
Comments Michael Ironside's Lewis Snart will reunite with his son Captain Cold and team up with him for a heist in the next episode set to air on October 20. 
The CW has shared a preview for the next episode of " The Flash ". Arriving online after the series' latest episode aired on Tuesday, October 13, the sneak-peek offers glimpses at fan-favorite villain Captain Cold a.k.a. Leonard Snart, played by Wentworth Miller , as he reunites with his abusive father Lewis Snart. Guest star Michael Ironside is introduced as Captain Cold's dad, and the two are seen teaming up for a heist in the 30-second clip. According to the synopsis, Captain Cold's sister Lisa ( Peyton List ) will also join the chilly family reunion as she forms an alliance with Barry ( Grant Gustin ) after her brother gets kidnapped. Titled "Family of Rogues", the third episode in the second season of "The Flash" is scheduled to air Tuesday, October 20 at 08:00 P.M. ET/PT on The CW. John Showater directed the installment based on script penned by Julian Meiojas and Katherine Walczak.
